abstract: The Day: The stock market is on a winning streak; there has also been a surge of violence. How logical is it to cite Occupy Wall Street as a factor in either case? Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: The stock market is on a winning streak; there has also been a surge of violence. How logical is it to cite Occupy Wall Street as a factor in either case? Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: As an old Roman might have said, post hoc ergo propter hoc.

headline.main: Credit, Blame and a Heaping Cup of Coincidence
